summary: Frontend testing completed for CryptoVault dashboard. Backend APIs working well (86.7% success rate), but frontend has critical authentication and dashboard loading issues preventing proper testing of AppLayout components.

critical_bugs.issue: Dashboard page stuck in 'Loading your session...' state after login
critical_bugs.impact: Users cannot access dashboard after successful login

critical_bugs.issue: Authentication state not persisting properly - no auth data in localStorage/sessionStorage/cookies
critical_bugs.impact: Dashboard redirects to login page even after successful authentication

critical_bugs.issue: Dashboard header, sidebar, and main content not rendering due to authentication issues

ui_bugs.issue: Onboarding loader overlay intercepting pointer events on homepage
ui_bugs.impact: Prevents interaction with homepage elements after login

integration_issues.issue: Successful login redirects to homepage instead of dashboard, then dashboard access fails
integration_issues.impact: Complete dashboard functionality cannot be tested

passed_tests: User signup and login API calls
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix authentication state management and session persistence. The AuthContext/ProtectedRoute is not properly maintaining user authentication state, causing dashboard to be stuck in loading state. Need to investigate JWT token handling, cookie management, or localStorage/sessionStorage implementation. Dashboard AppLayout components cannot be tested until authentication flow is fixed.
